rawConfiguration.text:
**THE DETAILS IN THIS DASHBOARD ARE ESTIMATES, THE [DATA MANAGEMENT HUB](https://one.newrelic.com/launcher/data-management-nerdlets.data-management-launcher) SHOULD BE USED TO VIEW OFFICIAL INGESTION RATES**

This page analyzes `Infrastructure Integrations` category of ingest using the known samples created by On-Host integrations. 

*If you find a missing integration, please [open an issue](https://github.com/newrelic/newrelic-quickstarts/issues/new/choose) on our GitHub!*

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT sum(GigabytesIngested) AS '1 DAY (GB)', rate(sum(GigabytesIngested), 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)' FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine='DataPlatform' AND usageMetric LIKE '%InfraIntegration%' LIMIT MAX SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO

SELECT
max(
  `OHI_Apache` +
  `OHI_Cassandra` +
  `OHI_Couchbase` +
  `OHI_Collectd` +
  `OHI_Elasticsearch` +
  `OHI_F5` +
  `OHI_HAProxy` +
  `OHI_Consul` +
  `OHI_Kafka` +
  `OHI_Memcached` +
  `OHI_MongoDB` +
  `OHI_MSSQL` +
  `OHI_MySQL` +
  `OHI_Nagios` +
  `OHI_NFS` +
  `OHI_NGINX` +
  `OHI_Oracle` +
  `OHI_PostgreSQL` +
  `OHI_Port_Monitor` +
  `OHI_RabbitMQ` +
  `OHI_Redis` +
  `OHI_Varnish_Cache` +
  `OHI_VMware_Tanzu` +
  `OHI_VMWare_vSphere` +
  `OHI_Windows_Event_Log` +
  `OHI_Apache_Zookeeper` +
  `OHI_Kubernetes` +
  `OHI_Container`
  ) AS '1 DAY (GB)',
rate(max(
  `OHI_Apache` +
  `OHI_Cassandra` +
  `OHI_Couchbase` +
  `OHI_Collectd` +
  `OHI_Elasticsearch` +
  `OHI_F5` +
  `OHI_HAProxy` +
  `OHI_Consul` +
  `OHI_Kafka` +
  `OHI_Memcached` +
  `OHI_MongoDB` +
  `OHI_MSSQL` +
  `OHI_MySQL` +
  `OHI_Nagios` +
  `OHI_NFS` +
  `OHI_NGINX` +
  `OHI_Oracle` +
  `OHI_PostgreSQL` +
  `OHI_Port_Monitor` +
  `OHI_RabbitMQ` +
  `OHI_Redis` +
  `OHI_Varnish_Cache` +
  `OHI_VMware_Tanzu` +
  `OHI_VMWare_vSphere` +
  `OHI_Windows_Event_Log` +
  `OHI_Apache_Zookeeper` +
  `OHI_Kubernetes` +
  `OHI_Container`
  ), 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
FROM (
SELECT
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('ApacheSample')) AS 'OHI_Apache',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('CassandraSample', 'CassandraColumnFamilySample')) AS 'OHI_Cassandra',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('CouchbaseBucketSample', 'CouchbaseClusterSample', 'CouchbaseNodeSample', 'CouchbaseQueryEngineSample')) AS 'OHI_Couchbase',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('CollectdSample')) AS 'OHI_Collectd',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('ElasticsearchClusterSample', 'ElasticsearchNodeSample', 'ElasticsearchCommonSample', 'ElasticsearchIndexSample')) AS 'OHI_Elasticsearch',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('F5BigIpSystemSample', 'F5BigIpVirtualServerSample', 'F5BigIpPoolSample', 'F5BigIpPoolMemberSample', 'F5BigIpNodeSample')) AS 'OHI_F5',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('HAProxyBackendSample', 'HAProxyFrontendSample', 'HAProxyServerSample')) AS 'OHI_HAProxy',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('ConsulDatacenterSample', 'ConsulAgentSample')) AS 'OHI_Consul',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('KafkaBrokerSample', 'KafkaConsumerSample', 'KafkaProducerSample', 'KafkaTopicSample', 'KafkaOffsetSample')) AS 'OHI_Kafka',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('MemcachedSample', 'MemcachedSlabSample')) AS 'OHI_Memcached',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('MongoCollectionSample', 'MongoConfigServerSample', 'MongoDatabaseSample', 'MongodTopSample', 'MongoSample', 'MongodSample', 'MongosSample')) AS 'OHI_MongoDB',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('MssqlDatabaseSample', 'MssqlInstanceSample', 'MssqlWaitSample')) AS 'OHI_MSSQL',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('MysqlSample')) AS 'OHI_MySQL',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('NagiosServiceCheckSample')) AS 'OHI_Nagios',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('NFSSample')) AS 'OHI_NFS',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('NginxSample')) AS 'OHI_NGINX',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('OracleDatabaseSample', 'OracleTablespaceSample')) AS 'OHI_Oracle',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('PostgresqlDatabaseSample', 'PostgresqlIndexSample', 'PostgresqlInstanceSample', 'PostgresqlTableSample', 'PgBouncerSample')) AS 'OHI_PostgreSQL',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('NetworkPortSample')) AS 'OHI_Port_Monitor',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('RabbitmqVhostSample', 'RabbitmqNodeSample', 'RabbitmqExchangeSample', 'RabbitmqQueueSample')) AS 'OHI_RabbitMQ',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('RedisSample', 'RedisKeyspaceSample')) AS 'OHI_Redis',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('VarnishSample', 'VarnishLockSample', 'VarnishStorageSample', 'VarnishMempoolSample', 'VarnishBackendSample')) AS 'OHI_Varnish_Cache',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('PCFContainerMetric', 'PCFCounterEvent', 'PCFHttpStartStop', 'PCFLogMessage', 'PCFValueMetric')) AS 'OHI_VMware_Tanzu',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('VSphereHostSample', 'VSphereClusterSample', 'VSphereVmSample', 'VSphereDatastoreSample', 'VSphereDatacenterSample', 'VSphereResourcePoolSample', 'VSphereSnapshotVmSample')) AS 'OHI_VMWare_vSphere',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('Windows Event Logs')) AS 'OHI_Windows_Event_Log',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('ZookeeperSample')) AS 'OHI_Apache_Zookeeper',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() LIKE 'K8s%') AS 'OHI_Kubernetes',
  filter(bytecountestimate()/10e8, WHERE eventType() IN ('ContainerSample')) AS 'OHI_Container'
FROM 
ApacheSample,
CassandraSample, CassandraColumnFamilySample,
CouchbaseBucketSample, CouchbaseClusterSample, CouchbaseNodeSample, CouchbaseQueryEngineSample,
CollectdSample,
ElasticsearchClusterSample, ElasticsearchNodeSample, ElasticsearchCommonSample, ElasticsearchIndexSample,
F5BigIpSystemSample, F5BigIpVirtualServerSample, F5BigIpPoolSample, F5BigIpPoolMemberSample, F5BigIpNodeSample,
HAProxyBackendSample, HAProxyFrontendSample, HAProxyServerSample,
ConsulDatacenterSample, ConsulAgentSample,
KafkaBrokerSample, KafkaConsumerSample, KafkaProducerSample, KafkaTopicSample, KafkaOffsetSample,
MemcachedSample, MemcachedSlabSample,
MongoCollectionSample, MongoConfigServerSample, MongoDatabaseSample, MongodTopSample, MongoSample, MongodSample, MongosSample,
MssqlDatabaseSample, MssqlInstanceSample, MssqlWaitSample,
MysqlSample,
NagiosServiceCheckSample,
NFSSample,
NginxSample,
OracleDatabaseSample, OracleTablespaceSample,
PostgresqlDatabaseSample, PostgresqlIndexSample, PostgresqlInstanceSample, PostgresqlTableSample, PgBouncerSample,
NetworkPortSample,
RabbitmqVhostSample, RabbitmqNodeSample, RabbitmqExchangeSample, RabbitmqQueueSample,
RedisSample, RedisKeyspaceSample,
VarnishSample, VarnishLockSample, VarnishStorageSample, VarnishMempoolSample, VarnishBackendSample,
PCFContainerMetric, PCFCounterEvent, PCFHttpStartStop, PCFLogMessage, PCFValueMetric,
VSphereHostSample, VSphereClusterSample, VSphereVmSample, VSphereDatastoreSample, VSphereDatacenterSample, VSphereResourcePoolSample, VSphereSnapshotVmSample,
`Windows Event Logs`,
ZookeeperSample,
K8sNodeSample,K8sNamespaceSample,K8sDeploymentSample,K8sReplicasetSample,K8sDaemonsetSample,K8sStatefulsetSample,K8sPodSample,K8sClusterSample,K8sContainerSample,K8sVolumeSample,K8sApiServerSample,K8sControllerManagerSample,K8sSchedulerSample,K8sEtcdSample,K8sEndpointSample,K8sServiceSample,K8sHpaSample,K8sCronjobSample,K8sJobSample,
ContainerSample
)
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO

FROM ApacheSample,
CassandraSample, CassandraColumnFamilySample,
CouchbaseBucketSample, CouchbaseClusterSample, CouchbaseNodeSample, CouchbaseQueryEngineSample,
CollectdSample,
ElasticsearchClusterSample, ElasticsearchNodeSample, ElasticsearchCommonSample, ElasticsearchIndexSample,
F5BigIpSystemSample, F5BigIpVirtualServerSample, F5BigIpPoolSample, F5BigIpPoolMemberSample, F5BigIpNodeSample,
HAProxyBackendSample, HAProxyFrontendSample, HAProxyServerSample,
ConsulDatacenterSample, ConsulAgentSample,
KafkaBrokerSample, KafkaConsumerSample, KafkaProducerSample, KafkaTopicSample, KafkaOffsetSample,
MemcachedSample, MemcachedSlabSample,
MongoCollectionSample, MongoConfigServerSample, MongoDatabaseSample, MongodTopSample, MongoSample, MongodSample, MongosSample,
MssqlDatabaseSample, MssqlInstanceSample, MssqlWaitSample,
MysqlSample,
NagiosServiceCheckSample,
NFSSample,
NginxSample,
OracleDatabaseSample, OracleTablespaceSample,
PostgresqlDatabaseSample, PostgresqlIndexSample, PostgresqlInstanceSample, PostgresqlTableSample, PgBouncerSample,
NetworkPortSample,
RabbitmqVhostSample, RabbitmqNodeSample, RabbitmqExchangeSample, RabbitmqQueueSample,
RedisSample, RedisKeyspaceSample,
VarnishSample, VarnishLockSample, VarnishStorageSample, VarnishMempoolSample, VarnishBackendSample,
PCFContainerMetric, PCFCounterEvent, PCFHttpStartStop, PCFLogMessage, PCFValueMetric,
VSphereHostSample, VSphereClusterSample, VSphereVmSample, VSphereDatastoreSample, VSphereDatacenterSample, VSphereResourcePoolSample, VSphereSnapshotVmSample,
`Windows Event Logs`,
ZookeeperSample,
K8sNodeSample,K8sNamespaceSample,K8sDeploymentSample,K8sReplicasetSample,K8sDaemonsetSample,K8sStatefulsetSample,K8sPodSample,K8sClusterSample,K8sContainerSample,K8sVolumeSample,K8sApiServerSample,K8sControllerManagerSample,K8sSchedulerSample,K8sEtcdSample,K8sEndpointSample,K8sServiceSample,K8sHpaSample,K8sCronjobSample,K8sJobSample,
ContainerSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET CASES(
WHERE eventType() IN ('ApacheSample') AS 'Apache',
WHERE eventType() IN ('CassandraSample', 'CassandraColumnFamilySample') AS 'Cassandra',
WHERE eventType() IN ('CouchbaseBucketSample', 'CouchbaseClusterSample', 'CouchbaseNodeSample', 'CouchbaseQueryEngineSample') AS 'Couchbase',
WHERE eventType() IN ('CollectdSample') AS 'Collectd',
WHERE eventType() IN ('ElasticsearchClusterSample', 'ElasticsearchNodeSample', 'ElasticsearchCommonSample', 'ElasticsearchIndexSample') AS 'Elasticsearch',
WHERE eventType() IN ('F5BigIpSystemSample', 'F5BigIpVirtualServerSample', 'F5BigIpPoolSample', 'F5BigIpPoolMemberSample', 'F5BigIpNodeSample') AS 'F5',
WHERE eventType() IN ('HAProxyBackendSample', 'HAProxyFrontendSample', 'HAProxyServerSample') AS 'HAProxy',
WHERE eventType() IN ('ConsulDatacenterSample', 'ConsulAgentSample') AS 'Consul',
WHERE eventType() IN ('KafkaBrokerSample', 'KafkaConsumerSample', 'KafkaProducerSample', 'KafkaTopicSample', 'KafkaOffsetSample') AS 'Kafka',
WHERE eventType() IN ('MemcachedSample', 'MemcachedSlabSample') AS 'Memcached',
WHERE eventType() IN ('MongoCollectionSample', 'MongoConfigServerSample', 'MongoDatabaseSample', 'MongodTopSample', 'MongoSample', 'MongodSample', 'MongosSample') AS 'MongoDB',
WHERE eventType() IN ('MssqlDatabaseSample', 'MssqlInstanceSample', 'MssqlWaitSample') AS 'MSSQL',
WHERE eventType() IN ('MysqlSample') AS 'MySQL',
WHERE eventType() IN ('NagiosServiceCheckSample') AS 'Nagios',
WHERE eventType() IN ('NFSSample') AS 'NFS',
WHERE eventType() IN ('NginxSample') AS 'NGINX',
WHERE eventType() IN ('OracleDatabaseSample', 'OracleTablespaceSample') AS 'Oracle',
WHERE eventType() IN ('PostgresqlDatabaseSample', 'PostgresqlIndexSample', 'PostgresqlInstanceSample', 'PostgresqlTableSample', 'PgBouncerSample') AS 'PostgreSQL',
WHERE eventType() IN ('NetworkPortSample') AS 'Port Monitor',
WHERE eventType() IN ('RabbitmqVhostSample', 'RabbitmqNodeSample', 'RabbitmqExchangeSample', 'RabbitmqQueueSample') AS 'RabbitMQ',
WHERE eventType() IN ('RedisSample', 'RedisKeyspaceSample') AS 'Redis',
WHERE eventType() IN ('VarnishSample', 'VarnishLockSample', 'VarnishStorageSample', 'VarnishMempoolSample', 'VarnishBackendSample') AS 'Varnish Cache',
WHERE eventType() IN ('PCFContainerMetric', 'PCFCounterEvent', 'PCFHttpStartStop', 'PCFLogMessage', 'PCFValueMetric') AS 'VMware Tanzu',
WHERE eventType() IN ('VSphereHostSample', 'VSphereClusterSample', 'VSphereVmSample', 'VSphereDatastoreSample', 'VSphereDatacenterSample', 'VSphereResourcePoolSample', 'VSphereSnapshotVmSample') AS 'VMWare vSphere',
WHERE eventType() IN ('Windows Event Logs') AS 'Windows Event Log',
WHERE eventType() IN ('ZookeeperSample') AS 'Apache Zookeeper',
WHERE eventType() LIKE 'K8s%' AS 'Kubernetes',
WHERE eventType() IN ('ContainerSample') AS 'Container'
) OR eventType()
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
TIMESERIES
LIMIT 25

rawConfiguration.text:
![New Relic](https://newrelic.com/themes/custom/curio/assets/mediakit/NR_logo_Horizontal.svg)
This page analyzes data coming from [On-Host integrations](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/integrations/host-integrations/host-integrations-list/). Data ingest for these integrations is most easily controlled in each integration's [configuration file](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/create-integrations/infrastructure-integrations-sdk/specifications/host-integrations-newer-configuration-format/#interval) (newer formats), or [definition file](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/create-integrations/infrastructure-integrations-sdk/specifications/host-integrations-standard-configuration-format/#definition-file) (older formats).

*Custom event names from integrations such as Flex, `nri-jmx`, `nri-perfmon`, or a custom query from a database integration are not analyzed*

widgets.title: On-Host Integrations In Use (Other charts will be blank)

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM ApacheSample,
CassandraSample, CassandraColumnFamilySample,
CouchbaseBucketSample, CouchbaseClusterSample, CouchbaseNodeSample, CouchbaseQueryEngineSample,
CollectdSample,
ElasticsearchClusterSample, ElasticsearchNodeSample, ElasticsearchCommonSample, ElasticsearchIndexSample,
F5BigIpSystemSample, F5BigIpVirtualServerSample, F5BigIpPoolSample, F5BigIpPoolMemberSample, F5BigIpNodeSample,
HAProxyBackendSample, HAProxyFrontendSample, HAProxyServerSample,
ConsulDatacenterSample, ConsulAgentSample,
KafkaBrokerSample, KafkaConsumerSample, KafkaProducerSample, KafkaTopicSample, KafkaOffsetSample,
MemcachedSample, MemcachedSlabSample,
MongoCollectionSample, MongoConfigServerSample, MongoDatabaseSample, MongodTopSample, MongoSample, MongodSample, MongosSample,
MssqlDatabaseSample, MssqlInstanceSample, MssqlWaitSample,
MysqlSample,
NagiosServiceCheckSample,
NFSSample,
NginxSample,
OracleDatabaseSample, OracleTablespaceSample,
PostgresqlDatabaseSample, PostgresqlIndexSample, PostgresqlInstanceSample, PostgresqlTableSample, PgBouncerSample,
NetworkPortSample,
RabbitmqVhostSample, RabbitmqNodeSample, RabbitmqExchangeSample, RabbitmqQueueSample,
RedisSample, RedisKeyspaceSample,
VarnishSample, VarnishLockSample, VarnishStorageSample, VarnishMempoolSample, VarnishBackendSample,
PCFContainerMetric, PCFCounterEvent, PCFHttpStartStop, PCFLogMessage, PCFValueMetric,
VSphereHostSample, VSphereClusterSample, VSphereVmSample, VSphereDatastoreSample, VSphereDatacenterSample, VSphereResourcePoolSample, VSphereSnapshotVmSample,
`Windows Event Logs`,
ZookeeperSample
SELECT uniqueCount(hostname) OR 0 AS 'Unique Hosts'
FACET CASES(
WHERE eventType() IN ('ApacheSample') AS 'Apache',
WHERE eventType() IN ('CassandraSample', 'CassandraColumnFamilySample') AS 'Cassandra',
WHERE eventType() IN ('CouchbaseBucketSample', 'CouchbaseClusterSample', 'CouchbaseNodeSample', 'CouchbaseQueryEngineSample') AS 'Couchbase',
WHERE eventType() IN ('CollectdSample') AS 'Collectd',
WHERE eventType() IN ('ElasticsearchClusterSample', 'ElasticsearchNodeSample', 'ElasticsearchCommonSample', 'ElasticsearchIndexSample') AS 'Elasticsearch',
WHERE eventType() IN ('F5BigIpSystemSample', 'F5BigIpVirtualServerSample', 'F5BigIpPoolSample', 'F5BigIpPoolMemberSample', 'F5BigIpNodeSample') AS 'F5',
WHERE eventType() IN ('HAProxyBackendSample', 'HAProxyFrontendSample', 'HAProxyServerSample') AS 'HAProxy',
WHERE eventType() IN ('ConsulDatacenterSample', 'ConsulAgentSample') AS 'Consul',
WHERE eventType() IN ('KafkaBrokerSample', 'KafkaConsumerSample', 'KafkaProducerSample', 'KafkaTopicSample', 'KafkaOffsetSample') AS 'Kafka',
WHERE eventType() IN ('MemcachedSample', 'MemcachedSlabSample') AS 'Memcached',
WHERE eventType() IN ('MongoCollectionSample', 'MongoConfigServerSample', 'MongoDatabaseSample', 'MongodTopSample', 'MongoSample', 'MongodSample', 'MongosSample') AS 'MongoDB',
WHERE eventType() IN ('MssqlDatabaseSample', 'MssqlInstanceSample', 'MssqlWaitSample') AS 'MSSQL',
WHERE eventType() IN ('MysqlSample') AS 'MySQL',
WHERE eventType() IN ('NagiosServiceCheckSample') AS 'Nagios',
WHERE eventType() IN ('NFSSample') AS 'NFS',
WHERE eventType() IN ('NginxSample') AS 'NGINX',
WHERE eventType() IN ('OracleDatabaseSample', 'OracleTablespaceSample') AS 'Oracle',
WHERE eventType() IN ('PostgresqlDatabaseSample', 'PostgresqlIndexSample', 'PostgresqlInstanceSample', 'PostgresqlTableSample', 'PgBouncerSample') AS 'PostgreSQL',
WHERE eventType() IN ('NetworkPortSample') AS 'Port Monitor',
WHERE eventType() IN ('RabbitmqVhostSample', 'RabbitmqNodeSample', 'RabbitmqExchangeSample', 'RabbitmqQueueSample') AS 'RabbitMQ',
WHERE eventType() IN ('RedisSample', 'RedisKeyspaceSample') AS 'Redis',
WHERE eventType() IN ('VarnishSample', 'VarnishLockSample', 'VarnishStorageSample', 'VarnishMempoolSample', 'VarnishBackendSample') AS 'Varnish Cache',
WHERE eventType() IN ('PCFContainerMetric', 'PCFCounterEvent', 'PCFHttpStartStop', 'PCFLogMessage', 'PCFValueMetric') AS 'VMware Tanzu',
WHERE eventType() IN ('VSphereHostSample', 'VSphereClusterSample', 'VSphereVmSample', 'VSphereDatastoreSample', 'VSphereDatacenterSample', 'VSphereResourcePoolSample', 'VSphereSnapshotVmSample') AS 'VMWare vSphere',
WHERE eventType() IN ('Windows Event Logs') AS 'Windows Event Log',
WHERE eventType() IN ('ZookeeperSample') AS 'Apache Zookeeper'
) OR eventType()
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM ApacheSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM ApacheSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET hostname OR clusterName
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
LIMIT 10

FROM CassandraSample, CassandraColumnFamilySample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM CassandraSample, CassandraColumnFamilySample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET hostname OR clusterName
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
LIMIT 10

FROM CollectdSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM CollectdSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET hostname OR clusterName
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
LIMIT 10

FROM ConsulDatacenterSample, ConsulAgentSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM ConsulDatacenterSample, ConsulAgentSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET hostname OR clusterName
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
LIMIT 10

FROM CouchbaseBucketSample, CouchbaseClusterSample,
CouchbaseNodeSample, CouchbaseQueryEngineSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM CouchbaseBucketSample, CouchbaseClusterSample,
CouchbaseNodeSample, CouchbaseQueryEngineSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET hostname OR clusterName
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
LIMIT 10

FROM ElasticsearchClusterSample, ElasticsearchNodeSample,
ElasticsearchCommonSample, ElasticsearchIndexSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM ElasticsearchClusterSample, ElasticsearchNodeSample,
ElasticsearchCommonSample, ElasticsearchIndexSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET hostname OR clusterName
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
LIMIT 10

FROM F5BigIpSystemSample, F5BigIpVirtualServerSample,
F5BigIpPoolSample, F5BigIpPoolMemberSample, F5BigIpNodeSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM F5BigIpSystemSample, F5BigIpVirtualServerSample,
F5BigIpPoolSample, F5BigIpPoolMemberSample, F5BigIpNodeSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET hostname OR clusterName
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
LIMIT 10

FROM HAProxyBackendSample, HAProxyFrontendSample, HAProxyServerSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM HAProxyBackendSample, HAProxyFrontendSample, HAProxyServerSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET hostname OR clusterName
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
LIMIT 10

FROM KafkaBrokerSample, KafkaConsumerSample,
KafkaProducerSample, KafkaTopicSample, KafkaOffsetSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM KafkaBrokerSample, KafkaConsumerSample,
KafkaProducerSample, KafkaTopicSample, KafkaOffsetSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET hostname OR clusterName
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
LIMIT 10

FROM MemcachedSample, MemcachedSlabSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM MemcachedSample, MemcachedSlabSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET hostname OR clusterName
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
LIMIT 10

FROM MongoCollectionSample, MongoConfigServerSample,
MongoDatabaseSample, MongodTopSample, MongoSample,
MongodSample, MongosSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM MongoCollectionSample, MongoConfigServerSample,
MongoDatabaseSample, MongodTopSample, MongoSample,
MongodSample, MongosSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET hostname OR clusterName
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
LIMIT 10

FROM MssqlDatabaseSample, MssqlInstanceSample, MssqlWaitSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM MssqlDatabaseSample, MssqlInstanceSample, MssqlWaitSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET hostname OR clusterName
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
LIMIT 10

FROM MysqlSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM MysqlSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET hostname OR clusterName
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
LIMIT 10

FROM NagiosServiceCheckSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM NagiosServiceCheckSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET hostname OR clusterName
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
LIMIT 10

FROM NFSSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'

LIMIT MAX
